Class AbstractContextAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      gov.nih.nci.hl7.ui.context.AbstractContextAction
All Implemented Interfaces:

Direct Known Subclasses:
AboutAction, AddCloneAction, AddFieldAction, AddMultipleAttributeAction, AddMultipleCloneAction, AddSegmentAction, BrowseAction, BrowseAction, CloseAllAction, DefaultAbstractAction, DefaultCloseAction, DefaultContextOpenAction, DefaultSaveAsAction, DefaultValidateAction, DeleteTreeNodeAction, EditTreeNodeAction, ExitAction, GenerateReportAction, GenerateReportAction, HelpAction, NewCSVSpecificationAction, NewHL7V3MessageAction, NewHSMAction, NewMapAction, PrintingAction, RefreshAction, RegenerateAction, RemoveCloneAction, RemoveMultipleAttributeAction, RemoveMultipleCloneAction, SaveAsAction, SelectChoiceAction, TreeCollapseAllAction, TreeExpandAllAction, ValidateCSVAction, ValidateHSMAction, ValidateMapAction
public abstract class AbstractContextAction
extends javax.swing.AbstractAction

This class provides generic data structure for actions in a context-based application.

Version:
Since caAdapter v1.2 revision $Revision: 1.1 $ date $Date: 2006-10-03 17:36:02 $
Author:
OWNER: Scott Jiang, LAST UPDATE $Author: marwahah $

setSuccessfullyPerformed

public void setSuccessfullyPerformed(boolean successfullyPerformed)
Set the flag value to indicate whether this action is successfully performed. It is better called "after" the actionPerformed() is called.

actionPerformed

public final void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
Invoked when an action occurs. To make this function final is to force descendant classes to implement or override doAction() method instead of this method.

doAction

protected abstract boolean doAction(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)
                             throws java.lang.Exception
The abstract function that descendant classes must be overridden to provide customsized handling.

Parameters:
e -
Returns:
true if the action is finished successfully; otherwise, return false.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

handleValidatorResults

public boolean handleValidatorResults(ValidatorResults validatorResults)
exam the given validator results and report to UI if necessary.

Parameters:
validatorResults -
Returns:
false, if anything serious is reported to UI for user's attention, which means the process has to abort; true, if everything is OK and process could continue;
